title: D-03 Post-Deployment Feedback Schema (PDFS)
description: Structured data schema for capturing real-world performance metrics and efficacy validation post-M-02 deployment (GSEP Stage 6). Essential for iterative refinement of S-01 Trust models.

M02_ID.description: ID of the deployed Mutation Payload.

PMH_Reference.description: Hashed reference to the Payload Manifest used during Stage 3/4 decision.

Efficacy_Validated.description: Did the M-02 meet its targeted performance goals?

S01_Simulation_Drift_Percentage.description: Percentage deviation between simulated S-01 (Trust) expectation and observed real-world efficacy.

Resource_Delta.description: Observed change in resource utilization relative to the baseline state (pre-M-02).

Policy_Compliance_Incidents.description: Count of minor non-fatal compliance breaches observed post-deployment.
